ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: and( not CONTAINS( $Profile.Name, "API" ), not CONTAINS( $Profile.Name, "System Admin"), or(text( SBU__c ) = "D&S", text( SBU__c ) = "ATR"), text( CBT_Tier_2__c ) <> "HTSI", Win_Only_Opportunity__c == true, or( Amount_Net_rollup__c <> 0, Total_Order_Count__c <> 0 ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Win Only Opportunity cannot have Opportunity Products or Opportunity Orders. Please remove the Opportunity Amount, Opportunity Products, and Opportunity Orders before setting the Win Only Flag.
